name: causality/packages/causality-core/src/functor.js
Functor
description:
class Functor is the primitive class for composing higher functor based class.
This class wrap [Ramda](https://ramdajs.com/) for providing Functional programming style method.

name: CoreFunctor
description: This method return core Ramda instance

unknown.tagValue: { Any } return found value or defaultValue

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: return value in case of not found

name: setIn
description: set value into object by the keys list

unknown.tagValue: { Any } return found value or defaultValue

name: zip
description: zip two array

name: unzip
description: Unzip array of pairs to two arrays

name: range
description: Return an array with the given range

name: causality/packages/causality-core/src/index.js
causality/packages/causality-core/src/store.js
Store
description:
class Store is the primitive class for composing higher storage class.
This class wrap [levelup](https://www.tensorflow.org/js) 
for connect with abstract-leveldown compliant stores.

name: getItem
description: Get item given the key

params.name: asBuffer
params.description: return object or buffer array, default object

name: setItem
description: Set new item with the given key and value

name: delItem
description: Delete item given the item key

name: makeCheckItemNameFn
description: Make name maching function based on prefix path

name: getItemList
description: Get the current items under the prefix path

name: causality/packages/causality-core/src/tensor.js
Tensor
description:
class Tensor is the primitive class for composing higher tensor based class.
This class wrap [tensorflowjs](https://www.tensorflow.org/js) for providing tensor calculation

name: CoreTensor
description: This method return the core tensor instance

name: isTensor
description: Check if object is tensor

unknown.tagValue: { Boolean } true if input is tensor

IndexDBStorage

This indexDBStorage class is the default consistent storage based on 
[leveldown](https://www.npmjs.com/package/leveldown) storage 
with support file extends: png, csv, text by those corresponding mixins.
{ mixWith: { 'node': [LevelDownMixins, TextFileMixins, PNGFileMixins, CSVFileMixins],
             'web': [LevelJSMixins, TextFileMixins, PNGFileMixins, CSVFileMixins] } }

description: get list of file base on prefix

name: causality/packages/causality-utils/src/stream.js
Stream
description:
This Stream class provide wrapper functions for 
[readable-stream](https://www.npmjs.com/package/readable-stream)

name: makeReadable
description: create reable object from readFn.

name: makeWritable
description: create writeable object from writeFn.

name: makeDuplex
description: create duplex object from writeFn and optional readFn.

name: makeTransform
description: create transform object from transformFn

name: makePipeline
description:
create pipeline from array of [readable, ...tranforms, writable].
This stream.makePipeline([readable, transform, writable]) 
equivalent to readable.pipe(transform).pipe(writable).

unknown.tagValue: { Promise } promise - resolve "Success" after finish or "Pipeline failed. ${err}".

params.name: onDataFn
params.description: handle function for data event at readable

return.description: promise - resolve "Success" after finish or "Pipeline failed. ${err}".

CausalNet
description:
The CausalNet class is the prebuilt pipeline with methods for 
processing data/train/evaluate/deploy/ensemble deploy
{ mixWith: [ 
        DataSourceMixins,
        PreprocessingMixins,
        LayerRunnerMixins, 
        ModelMixins, 
        EvaluatorMixins,
        TrainerMixins, 
        LoggerMixins,
        DeploymentMixins,
        EnsembleTrainerMixins,
        EnsembleModelMixins, 
        EnsembleDeploymentMixins ] }
